definitions.definition: To add sugar to; to sweeten with sugar.
To make (something unpleasant) seem less so.
examples: She has a gift for sugaring what would otherwise be harsh words.

definitions.definition: In making maple sugar , to complete the process of boiling down the syrup till it is thick enough to crystallize ; to approach or reach the state of granulation ; with the preposition off .
To apply sugar to trees or plants in order to catch moths .
To rewrite ( source code ) using syntactic sugar .
To remove hair using a paste of sugar, water , and lemon juice .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To add sugar to; to sweeten with sugar.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To make (something unpleasant) seem less so.

( US , Canada , regional ) In making maple sugar , to complete the process of boiling down the syrup till it is thick enough to crystallize ; to approach or reach the state of granulation ; with the preposition off .
( entomology ) To apply sugar to trees or plants in order to catch moths .
( programming , transitive ) To rewrite ( source code ) using syntactic sugar .
To remove hair using a paste of sugar, water , and lemon juice .
